original: intros x l l' Hsort_l Hsort_l' H1 H2. induction l, l'. - reflexivity. - simpl. destruct l'. + reflexivity. + simpl in H1, H2. destruct H1 as [H1a H1b]. destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]. simpl. specialize (H1a a). specialize (H2a a). destruct a, e. simpl in H1a, H2a. assert (eIndex0 = eIndex1). * apply (Nat.lt_antisym _ _ H1a H2a). * rewrite H. apply IHl; eauto. -- intros. apply H1b; eauto. -- intros. apply H2b; eauto.
